languages.text: Усмехнулся Неумирающий Император костяной усмешкой, а затем бросил взгляд на Домин, и умерло что-то внутри Домин навсегда. Ибо за гордыню пред ликом Смерти всегда приходится платить тяжко, но стоит она того.

The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.
languages.original_text: Усмехнулся Неумирающий Император костяной усмешкой, а затем бросил взгляд на Домин, и умерло что-то внутри Домин навсегда. Ибо за гордыню пред ликом Смерти всегда приходится платить тяжко, но стоит она того.

traits.locale_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Enim. It was then that something died forever inside the Enim. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, yet worth it.

The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Enim. It was then that something died forever inside the Enim. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, yet worth it.

The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

languages.text: Der Todlose Imperator schenkte {mf|dem|der} Domin ein knöchernes Grinsen. Und in diesem Augenblick starb etwas im Inneren {mf|des|der} Donim. Denn der Preis hochmütigen Stolzes im Angesicht des Todes ist stets hoch, aber die Höhe wert.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose Imperator schenkte {mf|dem|der} Domin ein knöchernes Grinsen. Und in diesem Augenblick starb etwas im Inneren {mf|des|der} Donim. Denn der Preis hochmütigen Stolzes im Angesicht des Todes ist stets hoch, aber die Höhe wert.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal lanzó una esquelética sonrisa y una mirada a{mf|l| la} Domin. En ese momento, algo murió eternamente en el interior de{mf|l| la} Domin, pues el orgullo y la arrogancia tienen un precio ante la Muerte, aunque merezca la pena pagarlo.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal lanzó una esquelética sonrisa y una mirada a{mf|l| la} Domin. En ese momento, algo murió eternamente en el interior de{mf|l| la} Domin, pues el orgullo y la arrogancia tienen un precio ante la Muerte, aunque merezca la pena pagarlo.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝は骨ばった笑みを浮かべ、ドミンを一瞥した。その瞬間、ドミンの中で何かが永遠に死んだ。死を前にした傲慢なプライドの代償は常に重いが、その重さに見合うだけの価値があるのだ。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝は骨ばった笑みを浮かべ、エニムを一瞥した。その瞬間、エニムの中で何かが永遠に死んだ。死を前にした傲慢なプライドの代償は常に重いが、その重さに見合うだけの価値があるのだ。

languages.text: 不死之神白骨森森的脸上露出了笑容，看了秘者一眼。在那一刻，秘者体内的某些东西彻底消亡了，因为在死亡面前，傲慢始终都会付出沉重的代价，但这样的代价是值得的。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

traits.locale_text: 不死之神白骨森森的脸上露出了笑容，看了秘者一眼。在那一刻，秘者体内的某些东西彻底消亡了，因为在死亡面前，傲慢始终都会付出沉重的代价，但这样的代价是值得的。

languages.text: À l'instant où l'Empereur Immortel jeta un regard {mf|au|à la} Domin avec l'esquisse d'un rictus osseux, quelque chose mourut en son sein. Car le prix qu'exige la Mort pour l'orgueil est toujours lourd, mais il en vaut la peine.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.

traits.locale_text: À l'instant où l'Empereur Immortel jeta un regard {mf|au|à la} Domin avec l'esquisse d'un rictus osseux, quelque chose mourut en son sein. Car le prix qu'exige la Mort pour l'orgueil est toujours lourd, mais il en vaut la peine.

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator, kemikten bir gülümseme bahşederek Domin'e bir bakış attı. Tam o anda Domin'in içindeki bir şey ebediyen yok oldu. Ölüm'le yüz yüzeyken küstah bir gurur sergilemenin bedeli her zaman ağırdır olsa da buna değerdir.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor grinned a bony grin, and cast a glance at the Domin. And at that moment, something died forever inside the Domin. For the price of arrogant pride in the face of Death is always heavy, but worth its weight.
